author: Seeth Laemmert
comment: I have a lot of faces (for my watch!). After getting this one, i basically stopped looking for, and even switching, then around. It's amazing, useful, clever. I wish i could keep it up and running all the time, but my battery didn't cope. Buy this face, it's completely worth it.

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: Wow what a complement. Thank you very much and I'm glad you love it so much.

title: Fantastic

author: Craig Kilner
comment: Can't believe this could be done on a watch face. The animations are out of this world. All runs smoothly and so glad you added a lighter version in colour as the free version was always slightly hard to read. All in all great watch face!!

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: WOW thanks for the compliment. I spent WAY too much time perfecting every little movement. Thank you for noticing, I really appreciate it. Also, I'm glad you dig the bright version, that was the number one complaint when this hit the market.

title: Epic!!

author: Win Win Putra
comment: This watch face is absolutely amazing. Please add the option for wood color like ebony, mahogany, teak, brown, etc *especially brown since it match my watch skin. Keep up the good work 🍻

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: Thank you. And I'll see if I can figure out an easy way to change the wood types. I fear that this would require a whole new watch though =(

title: Amazing!

author: Mazen Labban
comment: Have to touch tap action several times to get reaponse.
title: Not very responsive

author: Alfredo Martinez
comment: I bought this app and it didn't install on my moto 360 I'm afraid it won't install if I wait for it longer and not be able to get a refund after, I would like to know what happened

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: Do you have Watchmaker installed? http://goo.gl/FMxUfY

title: Its not working on my moto 360

author: Carter Cusson
comment: This is a beautiful watch face with so many features. Is it possible to change the weather to Fahrenheit or if it is not can you add it in the next update.

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: You can change this in the Watchmaker settings under "Weather" you will see it under "Temperature Scale"

title: Awesome

author: Cameron Stifffler
comment: Very impressive design. I love it... however I can't seem to figure out how to get the weather from my location... it has all the wrong temperatures

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: Thank you. You can set your weather settings in Watchmaker - Settings - Weather - Location.

author: Jordan Takacs
comment: This man is a genius. No one else could possibly make a watch like this!
title: AWESOME

author: Jason Platt
comment: This is a ridiculously incredible piece of art that just so happens to double as a watch face. I can't get over how intricate the design is, and I can't wait to see what this dev comes up with next.

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: THANK YOU! I appreciate it very much. Yes I completely obsessed over its creation.

title: Absolutely amazing.

author: Fred Schmitthammer
comment: I am at complete awe at the expertise of the developer of this watch face.  This is the best face I have seen to date!

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: Thank you, from the bottom of my (wooden) heart (rate).

title: Unspeakably Amazing

author: Ken M
comment: This is a whole different level.  Nothing comes close! Simply amazing!  You have some serious skills.  Love to see you create a steam punk version.

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: Thank you very much. I have give thought to s steam punk variation. I'll see what I can do.

title: Next generation

author: Howard Bamber
comment: There are so many great watch faces in watchmaker I only buy exceptional ones and this is one.

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: Wow, I appreciate that. Thank you very much.

title: Superb

author: Eli Benji
comment: Would gave a five star just doesn't show digital time on my moto 360...

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: Are you requesting a digital time feature? If so, just know that something like this is planned for a future release.

title: No digital time

author: Bobby Mac
comment: The developer has clearly put a crate load of time into this watch face, and it shows! This is a beautiful face with all you need. It's only the price of a small coffee, well worth it!  Plus it's unlocked! Great job and thank you.

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: Wow Bobby, thanks for the kind words. I appreciate it. I'm glad you enjoy the face.

title: Awesome...

author: Marshall Blakeslee
comment: it runs super slow on my moto 360 2nd gen

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: If you set your "Max Frame Rate" to a minimum of 15FPS you should notice a much smoother experience (the higher the better). You could also try checking the "Animation Boost" option as well.

title: slug

author: Darren Steer
comment: Loved the watch but unfortunately it just looks far too dim to keep.

reply.author: NwD
reply.content: The 1.1 update now includes a 2nd watch face called WoodWorks Bright which should hopefully fix this issue for you.

title: Too dim
